name: Vapor Volley
description:
V A P O R   V O L L E Y

OBJECTIVE

first to 10 wins, win difference 2

CONTROLS

generalbluered
  • space: next ball
  • m: mute music
  • n: mute effects
  • r: restart
  • a: move left
  • d: move right
  • w: jump
  • left arrow: move left
  • left arrow: move right
  • up arrow: jump
